macro.name: GCP_BUCKET
macro.description: Name of the bucket in Google Cloud Platform storage to use for staging the data

macro.name: GCP_CLIENT_EMAIL
macro.description: Service account client email from GCP console

macro.name: GCP_PRIVATE_KEY
macro.description: Private key object for the service account in PKCS#8 format

macro.name: GCP_CLIENT_ID
macro.description: Service account client ID from GCP console

macro.name: GCP_PRIVATE_KEY_ID
macro.description: Private key identifier for the service account from GCP console

macro.name: GCP_REGION
macro.description: Cloud storage location for specified bucket (optional)

macro.name: GCP_PROJECT_ID
macro.description: ID number for project from GCP console (required when creating a new bucket)

macro.name: FILE_LIST
macro.description: Required. Comma separated list of input files present in an Google Cloud Platform storage. Files should have same schema.

macro.name: HEADER
macro.description: Required. Property specifying whether first data row contains column/field names. Used to detect field names for creating a new database table.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_CONNECT_STRING
macro.description: Required. ODBC Connection string for connecting to Avalanche database. You can obtain this information from Avalanche portal.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_USERNAME
macro.description: Required. Username for connecting to the database using the ODBC DSN.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_PASSWORD
macro.description: Required. Password for connecting to the database using the ODBC DSN.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_TABLE
macro.description: Required. Name of the table in Avalanche, the data will be written to.
